title: Duo/Trio taking away position in ranked??
body:
Hey, i'm playin ranked game pretty often.
And i had duo/trio in my team, taking my position away without asking.
They just pick the champ and then say, 'hey we are duo, go top.'
Why do i have to make a concession for them??
Even if i report them after the game, for being toxic(those people usually are toxic),
I don't think riot even cares.
Report, me alone, riot really don't care.
I am so mad.

replies.body:
That's called "forcing roles" on other players and it's [absolutely bannable](https://twitter.com/MisterLyte/status/689646191454195712) and being [detected](https://twitter.com/MisterLyte/status/689646508447178753).

You can report 'role forcing'  under the _"Negative attitude"_ section in the end game report screen. Or if you decide to dodge the lobby, you can take a  screen shot  of any evidence (chat logs and the champions they picked) and send it directly to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Hopefully with new client Riot will be able to make some much needed changes to lobby kicking and reporting, and end this kind of behaviour for good. But until then, what I outlined above is the best course of action ATM.

I hope that helps :)

Thank you so much for the suggestion. i should screenshot if it happens again :/
Thank you again.

Report them, without your consent they can't take your position away.

This was happening a lot when Dynamic queue first was released and everyone who got reported for it ended up with some sort of ban.

UNLESS IF YOU REPORT PEOPLE FOR DOING SHIT, NOTHING WILL HAPPEN ABOUT IT.

Hello, thanks for reply.
Of course, I report every game when i can't take my role. 
But never get any feedback from riot(When somebody got punished, they usually notice me with a little msg window on the client).
Doesn't it mean they didn't get any punishment?
I feel so resentment. This is unfair. 
I couldn't play my role, lost game, got blamed and they haven't got any punishment.
Don't tell them that you reported them, otherwise you will get 3-man reported and banned for not being good at a role you didn't want.
